programme.title: The Original Flash Gordon
programme.desc: Dr. Alexis Zarkov takes off in a rocket ship to Mongo with Flash Gordon and Dale Arden as his assistants. They find that the planet is ruled by the cruel Emperor Ming, who lusts after Dale and sends Flash to fight in the arena. Ming's daughter, Princess Aura, tries to spare Flash's life. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Presents: The Original Flash Gordon
programme.desc: Aura helps Flash to escape as Zarkov is put to work in Ming's laboratory and Dale is prepared for her wedding to Ming. Flash meets Prince Thun, leader of the Lion Men, and the pair return to the palace to rescue Dale. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Presents The Original Flash Gordon season1 ep 3
programme.desc: Dun - uh. Dun - uh. Dun - uh. After thwarting Ming, in his intention to force Dale into marriage, Flash faces the terrors of the dreaded King Kala and his Shark Men. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Presents The Original Flash Gordon. Season 1 Ep 4
programme.desc: Flash's intention to free the clay people is misinterpreted. He must fight for his life. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Presents: The Original Flash Gordon. S1E5
programme.desc: Flash, Dale, Aura and Thun escape from the underwater city, but get captured by King Vultan and the Hawkmen. Dr. Zarkov befriends Prince Barin, and they race to the rescue. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Presents: The Original Flash Gordon S1E6
programme.desc: Dale pretends to fall in love with King Vultan to try and rescue Flash, Barin, and Thun. They are put to work in the Hawkmen's atomic furnaces. Duration: 1800

programme.title: Space Channel Presents: the Original Flash Gordon S1E7 and E8
programme.desc: Flash, Barin, Thun and Zarkov create an explosion in the atomic furnaces. Then....Dr. Zarkov saves the Hawkmen's city in the sky from falling, earning Flash and his friends King Vultan's gratitude. Ming insists that Flash fight a tournament of death against a masked opponent, revealed to be Barin, and then against a vicious orangopoid. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Presents: The Original Flash Gordon S1 E9 & 10
programme.desc: Flash survives the tournament with Aura's help, after she discovers the weak point of the orangopoid. Still determined to win Flash, Aura has him drugged to make him lose his memory. Flash recovers his memory. Ming is determined to have Flash executed. Duration: 3600

programme.desc: Join us as we travel through the Space Channel Universe and experience the Final Frontier like never before. Duration: 5400

programme.title: Space Channel Movie: Solar System: Secrets of the Universe
programme.desc: Join our host on the International Space Station of the year 2050. Marvel at the three-dimensional sights and learn many things about the astral bodies that surround us. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Solar Impact
programme.desc: We start off in a cafe…but there’s more than breakfast on the menu as a solar flare gives some the appetite for….brains..(reaction yuck) Packed with lovers, secrets, and a life on the run… Also, a couple of great shorts from Cinespace. Duration: 7200

programme.title: 20 Million Miles to Earth
programme.desc: The first U.S. spaceship to Venus crash-lands off the coast of Sicily on its return trip. A dangerous, lizard-like creature comes with it and quickly grows gigantic. Duration: 7200

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: An Alien lands in Washington D.C. and has a warning for all mankind. He tells the people of Earth that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Robinson Crusoe on Mars
programme.desc: Commander Kit Draper is forced to crash-land on Mars when his mission goes horribly wrong. He must figure out how to find oxygen, water, and food on the lifeless planet. Duration: 9000

programme.title: Capricorn ONE
programme.desc: When the first manned flight to Mars is deemed unsafe and scrubbed on the launch pad, anxious authorities must scramble to retain their funding - and so an unthinkable plot to fake the mission is hatched. Duration: 9000
